azurerm_dev_test_virtual_network.description: Manages a Virtual Network within a DevTest Lab.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Dev Test Virtual Network. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

lab_name.description: Specifies the name of the Dev Test Lab in which the Virtual Network should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the Dev Test Lab resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

description.description: A description for the Virtual Network.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

use_public_ip_address.description: Can Virtual Machines in this Subnet use Public IP Addresses? Possible values are `Allow`, `Default` and `Deny`.

use_in_virtual_machine_creation.description: Can this subnet be used for creating Virtual Machines? Possible values are `Allow`, `Default` and `Deny`.

id.description: The ID of the Dev Test Virtual Network.

unique_identifier.description: The unique immutable identifier of the Dev Test Virtual Network.

name.description: The name of the Subnet for this Virtual Network.

create.description: Used when creating the DevTest Virtual Network.

update.description: Used when updating the DevTest Virtual Network.

read.description: Used when retrieving the DevTest Virtual Network.

delete.description: Used when deleting the DevTest Virtual Network.
